item.title: Create a tensor from a Dataframe (gota)
item.description: This howto explains how to create a tensor from a dataframe using gota The goal is to read a csv file and create a *tensor.Dense with shape (2,2). Create the dataframe from a csv file Consider a csv file with the following content: sepal_length,sepal_width,petal_length,petal_width,species 5.1 ,3.5 ,1.4 ,0.2 ,setosa 4.9 ,3.0 ,1.4 ,0.2 ,setosa 4.7 ,3.2 ,1.3 ,0.2 ,setosa 4.6 ,3.1 ,1.5 ,0.2 ,setosa 5.0 ,3.6 ,1.4 ,0.2 ,setosa .
